nodes.text: The Downed Blood Razor's Transport was a camp built around a transport ship of the Blood Razors that had crash-landed on the planet of Lok. Since that time, it had been used as a base of operations for the Blood Razors.

Sometime following the Battle of Yavin, Baldwin sent a smuggler to smuggle contraband to the fence Briscoe at the downed transport. Circa 1 ABY, the outcast Andria E'liyha convinced a spacer to attack the Blood Razor camp in order to steal the treasure of the pirates. Around the same time, a spacer entered the camp, fought some pirates and collected a sword left behind by Rydel Delan.

The same year, the Rebel officer Adar Tallon dispatched a Rebel operative to the downed Blood Razor vessel. The spacer retrieved the security override codes of a Corellian corvette of the Corellian Security Force that was carrying a captured Rebel pilot.
